metadata.title: CVE-2016-0830 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: btif_config.c in Bluetooth in Android 6.x before 2016-03-01 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and persistentdaemon crash) by triggering a large number of configuration entries, andconsequently exceeding the maximum size of a configuration file, akainternal bug 26071376.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
